rooms.description: Large entrance hall with wheelchair-accessible ramp, integrated waiting area.
Spacious living room with wide doorways for accessibility, Vastu placement in the south-eastern area.
Dining room with natural light and wheelchair accessible entrance, positioned according to Vastu.
Modern kitchen layout with barrier-free access, located in the north-west region as per Vastu.
Servant's quarters integrated on the ground floor for easy access, designed with basic amenities and natural light.
Adjacent utility room accessible from kitchen and servant's quarters.

openings.description: Main entrance door with wheelchair ramp leading to the entrance hall.
Secondary exit door ensuring easy access for wheelchair users.
Large windows in the living room to enhance natural light and air circulation.
Windows in the kitchen ensuring proper ventilation.
